name: Kleavor

passive.name: Tree Cutting
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may discard one or three cards from the top of your deck to draw one or two cards respectively.

attacks.name: Axe Crush
attacks.effect: Deals 30 more damage if there are 7 or fewer cards in your discard pile.

flavor: Their giant axes are used to chop down trees. Early societies used the axes as tools.
